column1: '''Mersday''' was the sixth day of the week in the [[Shire Calendar]]. It represented the [[Númenórean]] day ''[[Oraearon]]''
After the reform of [[Isengrim Took II]]
column2: <ref name=cal/> dates such as [[1 March]] and [[1 September]] always fell on Mersday.
a word preserved in the [[Yellowskin]].<ref name=cal/>

column1: ''Mersday'' is translated as Thursday in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
column2: however as it was one day before the chief day of the week
column3: it rather corresponded to our Saturday. For this reason there was one exception
